title: Winter/Christmas Skins
body:
{{champion:432}} This discussion is about the idea of a Winter Bard with Poro elves Skin. Meeps would be replaced with Poro elves and instead of the gold dust throughout his spells, it would be some kind of winter/snow effect. I think that this will make more summoners choose bard for games hence making him a more common pick in champion select, so people wont dodge as often.
Hope to see what the rest of you think about this skin!
Also, Please up-vote if you like the skin idea!
{{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}}{{champion:432{{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:432}}
We may post further discussions in the future with any other future skin ideas!
Please be on the lookout for them if you liked this idea!
P.S. Half of the credit for this idea has to be given to my Best friend, Snivyzorua {{champion:37}}

Thanks for the feedback :)
But why do you think Bard is a troll pick in the first place? And why would you think a new skin would suddenly make him less of a troll pick?

Every time I've seen a summoner pick bard in champion select the rest of the team begs them not to and if they follow through with it, someone normally dodges. 
If the skin came out, more people would pick bard, therefore making him a more viable choice in champion select, so people wont dodge on sight.
More people picking him doesn't make him less of a troll pick.

Yes but there are people out there that play him seriously. All the trolls ruin the experience for the real bard players. This skin is to recognise those that aren't trolls and actually want to have fun playing bard without their team dodging and/or afking. {{champion:432}} {{summoner:32}} {{summoner:31}}

A) the skin won't change people dodging or not.
B) having the skin doesn't make you not a troll.
C) Bard even when being played properly can fuck up and troll people.

Regardless of if it would have any effect on troll picks or not, a Christmas Bard skin would still kick ass..
No it wouldn't stop someone dodging -before- the game started but I personally do feel encouraged by skins on champions... It might stop someone from rage quitting super early on in the game.
I have skins on all the champions I main and love playing after all :^)
There is a lot of bard hate out there.

I Agree with the Bard skin being awesome, I just think the community dislikes Bard in general because of their experiences and how his kit is a bit... off. Still, just because a champion isn't the best, doesn't mean it should have less skins than other champions. Like Ekko has been out less time than Bard, but he already has 2 skins (Sandstorm and Academy). While bard has 1 and a Chroma skin even though he has been out for a longer period of time...

> A) the skin won't change people dodging or not.
B) having the skin doesn't make you not a troll.
> C) Bard even when being played properly can fuck up and troll people.


A) Yes, but if it is a good skin more people would want to play him, hence making him a more common pick in Champion Select. So people wont be as mad/annoyed if there are a lot of Bards playing.
B) We never said having a skin doesn't make you a troll, but the main people who are going to get the skin are going to play him more often and might find out his true potential in team fights.
C) Yes, but if your team has good communication, there shouldn't be many mess ups in the game solely because of the Bard.

A) it's like you don't have the understanding of why bard is a troll pick, Bard can singlehandedly lose a game for his team, a skin doesn't change this fact, it just makes the fact even more blatant because he gets picked more.
B) What makes you think trolls aren't planning on buying skins?
C) Good communication or not bard can fuck up and lose a game, i've been in a 5 man and had a bard singlehandedly fuck us over, and that was with full voice comms.
D) did you really downvote my posts because i pointed out how your making no sense?

Yes, trolls do buy skins but the majority of people who put their hard earned money into a champion are planning on playing him seriously,  this  _won't_ eliminate trolls but it **will** hopefully bring new publicity to a not commonly played champion. Bard can ruin a team fight, but many other champions can too. It's about learning when and when not to use his abilities, like every other champion. I appreciate the feedback though, everyone has different opinions that's what this post is for :)

Well you see, I love bard and his set, giving him a new skin will make me extremely happy as he is basically my second main first being -->{{champion:268}}  any way people do beg me not to play bard but I do well and prove them wrong. So try not to be one-sided about this ok :)
